name: sequinned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered in or decorated with sequins (= a small, shiny discs): a shimmering, blue sequinned dress Sequinned flip-flops can be worn with everything from jeans to long dresses. See
sequin
More examplesFewer examplesOnto the stage slinked a tall woman in a long sequinned dress adorned with huge crimson feathers.a bright red suit with silver sequinned lapelsI wore a top embellished with a glittery, sequinned Union Jack.
